captions.text:
>>MS. JONES,
WHAT IS YOUR RELATIONSHIP WITH MY CLIENT?

>>WE'VE BEEN DATING FOR ABOUT A YEAR NOW.
>>AND IN ALL THAT TIME DID HE EVER EXHIBIT
A VIOLENT SIDE OF HIMSELF?

>>OH, NO!
IN FACT WHEN I HEARD HE WAS ON TRIAL FOR ASSAULT

I ACTUALLY LAUGHED.
>>HOW WOULD YOU DESCRIBE HIM?

>>UH, VERY KIND, GENTLE, ALMOST WEAK.
I WOULD SAY HE IS A PARTICULARLY WEAK MAN.

>>WEAK YOU SAY?
>>OH YEAH.

WEAK, FRAIL, YOU KNOW,
LIKE A PIECE OF DRIED STRAW OR A KITTEN WITH
BRITTLE BONES AND POOR EYESIGHT.

>>SO HE WOULDN'T HURT A FLY.
I DON'T KNOW THAT I WOULD SAY WOULDN'T,

I'D PROBABLY SAY COULDN'T.
HE COULD NOT HURT A FLY BECAUSE OF HIS PHYSICAL

WEAKNESS.
>>SO WHAT YOU'RE ACTUALLY SAYING IS THAT

MY CLIENT
IS LITERALLY INCAPABLE OF COMMITTING THIS

CRIME.
>>YES, OR ANY SPORT OR ANY OTHER ACTIVITY
YOU MIGHT CONSIDER MANLY.

>>UH, OBJECTION.
>>ON WHAT GROUNDS?

>>I'M NOT SURE THE WITNESS IS BEING COMPLETELY
HONEST.

>>MATT, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
THIS IS GREAT.

SHE'S PROVING YOUR INNOCENCE.
>>YEAH, BUT NOBODY BELIEVES HER RIGHT?
I MEAN, THEY KNOW SHE'S EXAGGERATING DON'T THEY?

>>TRUST ME.
JUST SIT THERE AND LET ME DO MY JOB AND BY

THE END OF
THE DAY YOU'LL BE A FREE MAN.

>>FINE.
NO OBJECTIONS YOUR HONOR.

>>I'D KNEW YOU'D CAVE.
>>WHAT?

>>I SAID I'D KNEW YOU'D CAVE.
YOU GOT NO BACKBONE SON.

YOU JUST GOING TO SIT THERE AND TAKE IT.
YOU'RE LIKE A SAD FLOWER.

>>I DON'T THINK IT'S APPROPRIATE FOR YOU
TO BE--

>>MATT, DON'T TALK BACK TO THE JUDGE.
IT MAKES YOU LOOK AGGRESSIVE.

>>BUT HE JUST-- >>JUST SIT THERE AND BE QUIET.
>>FINE.

[COUGHING] >>YOU'RE A WIMP.
>>MS.JONES, ON THE NIGHT OF ASSAULT YOU

AND MY CLIENT WERE ON A DATE, IS THAT CORRECT?
>>YES.

I WANTED TO GO TO THE MOVIES, BUT HE WANTED
TO UPDATE

HIS PINTEREST BOARD.
>>WOW.

HE IS SUCH A GIRL.
>>OKAY, ALL RIGHT.

THAT'S IT.
I CAN DO THINGS.

OKAY EVERYONE?
I WORK OUT.

WE GO TO THE GYM ALL THE TIME.
TELL THEM MAL.

>>IT'S TRUE.
YOU SHOULD SEE HIM LIFT WEIGHTS.

IT'S LIKE WATCHING A BABY HORSE TRY TO STAND
FOR THE FIRST TIME.

>>THAT'S IT.
THAN HOW CAN I DO THIS?

IS THIS TABLE BOLTED?
IT'S BOLTED TO THE GROUND EVERYONE.

CONFIRMATION.
LET THE RECORD SHOW THAT THE TABLE WAS BOLTED.

DEFENDANT SHRIEKED LIKE A WOMAN?
I DO NOT SHRIEK.

[SHRIEK] THAT'S A SOLID CHAIR.
>>CASE DISMISSED.

YOU AND THE LITTLE LADY CAN GO HOME.
>>THANK YOU YOUR HONOR.

>>I WAS TALKING TO HER.
>>OH.

THAT'S IT.
I DID IT OKAY?

CONFESSION!
MAYBE NOW YOU'LL SEE THAT I AM NOT A MAN

TO BE TRIFLED WITH.
>>DID YOU JUST SAY YOU'RE NOT A MAN?

[LAUGHTER] >>IN THE CONTEXT--
>>CASE DISMISSED.

>>NO, YOUR HONOR.
BUT I REALLY AM GUILTY.

>>SURE YOU ARE SWEETIE.
LET'S JUST GET YOU HOME OKAY?

>>I HURT MY FOOT.
>>I KNOW.

OKAY LET'S GO.
>>YOU JUST GRABBED MY ARM REALLY HARD.
